items.sentence: Plowing looks so easy when you see it done by others.
The man suspected of murdering Tom has been arrested.
Tom is going to spend the rest of the week in Boston.
Tom spent more than he can really afford on that car.
My new laptop is thinner and lighter than my old one.
Our political system was shaped by feudal traditions.
I don't think that things will stay the way they are.
Your mother and I would never force you to marry Tom.
Your job is to help Tom do whatever needs to be done.
We waited a long time, but Tom never showed up again.
I didn't know that Tom wasn't planning on doing that.
Is it OK to feed my dog the same thing I feed my cat?
When was the last time you visited your grandparents?
I dug for about thirty minutes and then took a break.
I didn't know when Tom would be coming to pick me up.
If I had a lot of money, I'd travel around the world.
I have just been to the airport to see my friend off.
It's necessary for you to do some exercise every day.
It's impossible for me to finish the work in an hour.
They agreed to investigate the cause of the accident.
